subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: As the team pushes toward its first N.H.L. playoff berth since 2007, Mark Streit, Evgeni Nabokov and Lubomir Visnovsky have provided more than good company.
snippet: As the team pushes toward its first N.H.L. playoff berth since 2007, Mark Streit, Evgeni Nabokov and Lubomir Visnovsky have provided more than good company.
